mapper.insert: insert into students () values ( stu_no=#{stu_no}, stu_name=#{stu_name}, stu_sex=#{stu_sex}, stu_papers_type=#{stu_papers_type}, stu_papers_no=#{stu_papers_no}, stu_grade=#{stu_grade}, stu_education=#{stu_education}, stu_graduation=#{stu_graduation}, stu_college=#{stu_college}, stu_major=#{students}, stu_class=#{stu_class} );
